sentences.sContent: Hungry beggars roamed the streets in search of food.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hungry beggars roamed the streets in search of food.
sentences.sCn: 饥饿的乞丐在街上徘徊寻找食物。

sentences.sContent: Some tribes migrate with their cattle in search of fresh grass.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some tribes migrate with their cattle in search of fresh grass.
sentences.sCn: 一些部落为寻找嫩草带着他们的牲口迁徙。

sentences.sContent: The geological prospecting team ranged over the desert in search of valuable deposits of oil.
sentences.sContent_eng: The geological prospecting team ranged over the desert in search of valuable deposits of oil.
sentences.sCn: 地质勘探队走遍了这片沙漠，寻找有开采价值的油层。
